SEARCH
Module HospitalManagementSystem
Package controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class manages user authentication and user session management in the system. It provides methods for logging in, changing passwords, checking login status, and logging out.

  • Method Details

    • userLogin

      public boolean userLogin(String userID, String userPass)
      Authenticates the user with the given user ID and password. If successful, the user is logged in.
      Parameters:
      userID - The user ID of the user trying to log in.
      userPass - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String newUserPass)
      Changes the password of the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      newUserPass - The new password to set for the user.

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Returns the login status of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is logged in, false otherwise.

    • logOut

      public void logOut()
      Logs out the user, saving all records and clearing the session data.

    • isFirstLogin

      public boolean isFirstLogin()
      Checks if the logged-in user is logging in for the first time.
      Returns:
      true if it's the user's first login, false otherwise.

    • getLoggedUser

      public User getLoggedUser()
      Retrieves the logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The logged-in user.
